Module vpm.gui_prototype
Package vpm.gui_prototype.models.DatabaseStuff.PetData

Class SqlitePetDAO

java.lang.Object
vpm.gui_prototype.models.DatabaseStuff.PetData.SqlitePetDAO
All Implemented Interfaces:
IPetDAO
public class SqlitePetDAO extends Object implements IPetDAO
Implementation of the IPetDAO interface for performing CRUD operations on pets in a SQLite database.

  • Constructor Details

    • SqlitePetDAO

      public SqlitePetDAO()
      Constructs an instance of SqlitePetDAO and establishes a connection to the database. It also creates the pets table if it does not exist.

  • Method Details

    • createPetTable

      public void createPetTable()
      Creates the pets table in the database if it does not already exist.

    • addPet

      public void addPet(Pet pet, int userId)
      Description copied from interface: IPetDAO
      Adds a new pet to the database associated with a specific user.
      Specified by:
      addPet in interface IPetDAO
      Parameters:
      pet - The pet to be added. Must not be null.
      userId - The ID of the user to whom the pet belongs. Must be a valid user ID.

    • updatePet

      public void updatePet(Pet pet, int userId)
      Description copied from interface: IPetDAO
      Updates an existing pet's details in the database.
      Specified by:
      updatePet in interface IPetDAO
      Parameters:
      pet - The pet with updated details. Must not be null.
      userId - The ID of the user who owns the pet. Must be a valid user ID.

    • getLastInteractionTime

      public LocalDateTime getLastInteractionTime(int petId)
      Retrieves the last interaction time for a specific pet from the database.
      Specified by:
      getLastInteractionTime in interface IPetDAO
      Parameters:
      petId - The ID of the pet.
      Returns:
      The last interaction time as a LocalDateTime object, or null if not found.

      Deletes a pet from the database.
      Specified by:
      deletePet in interface IPetDAO
      Parameters:

      userId - The ID of the user who owns the pet. Must be a valid user ID.

    • getPet

      public Pet getPet(int userId, int petId)
      Description copied from interface: IPetDAO
      Retrieves a specific pet from the database based on the user ID and pet ID.
      Specified by:
      getPet in interface IPetDAO
      Parameters:
      userId - The ID of the user who owns the pet. Must be a valid user ID.
      petId - The ID of the pet to retrieve. Must be a valid pet ID.
      Returns:
      The pet associated with the given user ID and pet ID, or null if not found.

    • getAllUsersPets

      public List<Pet> getAllUsersPets(int userId)
      Description copied from interface: IPetDAO
      Retrieves all pets associated with a specific user from the database.
      Specified by:
      getAllUsersPets in interface IPetDAO
      Parameters:
      userId - The ID of the user whose pets are to be retrieved. Must be a valid user ID.
      Returns:
      A list of pets owned by the specified user. If the user has no pets, returns an empty list.

    • getAllPets

      public List<Pet> getAllPets()
      Description copied from interface: IPetDAO
      Retrieves all pets from the database, regardless of ownership.
      Specified by:
      getAllPets in interface IPetDAO
      Returns:
      A list of all pets in the database. If there are no pets, returns an empty list.
